      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon​(WeaponCard weapon)
               throws MaxCardsInHandException
        Adds a weapon to your hand when you do not have to discard one
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon you want to add
        Throws:
        MaxCardsInHandException - if you already have 3 cards but you have not decided to discard one

      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon​(WeaponCard addedWeapon,
                      WeaponCard discardWeapon)
        Adds a weapon in the position of the one you want to discharge
        Parameters:
        addedWeapon - the weapon to be added
        discardWeapon - the weapon to be replaced

                throws MaxCardsInHandException
        Method to add a powerup to add a powerup to a player's jhand
        Parameters:
        powerup - the powerup to be added
        Throws:
        MaxCardsInHandException - in case the player already has 3 powerups on his hand

      • discardPowerup

        public void discardPowerup​(PowerupCard powerup)
                    throws EmptyHandException
        Discards the specified powerup from your hand
        Parameters:
        powerup - the powerup to be discarded
        Throws:
        EmptyHandException - if your hand has no powerups

      • discardPowerupByIndex

        public void discardPowerupByIndex​(int i)
                           throws EmptyHandException
        Method that discards the powerup in the specified index from the current player
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the powerup to discard
        Throws:
        EmptyHandException - in case the current player has no powerups in his hand

      • getPowerupByName

        public int getPowerupByName​(java.lang.String powerupName,
                            RoomColor color)
                     throws InexistentColorException
        Method used to receive a powerup given his name and color in case two are possessed
        Parameters:
        powerupName - String containing the powerup name
        color - the color of the powerup to be returned
        Returns:
        the powerup specified in the player's hand
        Throws:
        InexistentColorException - in case the color passed does not exist
